mapper.select: select p.post_no, p.member_id, p.post_time, p.post_type, p.post_content, f.fund_title, t.tag_no, t.tag_name, t.tag_type, m.map_name, m.map_place from post p left join fund_post f on p.post_no = f.post_no left join map m on p.post_no = m.post_no left join tag t on p.post_no = t.post_no WHERE t.tag_name = #{tagName} order by p.post_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into post (post_no, member_id, post_type, post_time, post_content) values (#{postNo}, #{memberId}, #{postType}, systimestamp, #{postContent})
mapper.update: update post set post_content = #{postContent} where post_no = #{postNo}
